TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ApplicationNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies the name of the COM+ application to be used for the install of the components in the assembly. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates the use of this attribute to mark a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> class.
[!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Basic/CPP/calculator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Basic/CS/calculator.cs#1)]

Docs.param: The name of the COM+ application.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the name of the COM+ application to be used for the install of the components.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating the name of the COM+ application that contains the components in the assembly.
Docs.value: The name of the COM+ application.
